original_text: So they killed the bulls. The priests took the blood and they splashed it on the altar. Then they killed the male sheep. The priests splashed their blood on the altar too. Then they killed the lambs. The priests also splashed their blood on the altar.
korean_text: 이에 수소를 잡으매 제사장들이 그 피를 받아 제단에 뿌리고 또 숫양들을 잡으매 그 피를 제단에 뿌리고 또 어린 양들을 잡으매 그 피를 제단에 뿌리고

sentences.original_text: and they splashed it on the altar
Then they killed the male sheep
The priests splashed their blood on the altar too

sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 그들은 어린 양들을 죽였다

sentences.original_text: The priests also splashed their blood on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들은 그들의 피 또한 제단에 뿌렸다
